QuestData.Title: The Head of Her Enemy
QuestData.Description: You have done a wonderful thing, $n. With de destruction of Gloomtail, Maka'fon is no longer bothered by de presence of de razorwings. It seems dat Gloomtail destroyed her eggs some time ago. $b$bTake Gloomtail's head to Maka'fon as proof dat he is gone. When she finds de scent of Ben'jin on it, she will once again seek a worthy mate. $b$bWhen Ben'jin senses dat, he will approach and nature will take over.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place Gloomtail's head in front of Maka'fon so that she knows her territory is safe and that Ben'jin is the reason.
